page.title: 13RELIGION
page.content: We spoke to the school chaplain Rev. D.Strachan,minister of St.Andrew's Church of Scotland who told us about the parish of Aberfeldy and Amulree, an area of some 180 sq.km. In Aberfeldy there are 585 members of the church but in Amulree there are only 41 members. The church organists for the parish are Mrs.Murch,Mrs,McCallum and Mr. Goodman. Flowers for the church are provided on a rota which is displayed at the beginning of the new year. Rev.Strachan has lived and preached in the area for 6 years but has been a minister for 8 years.
